Package marc.nguyen.minesweeper.client.presentation.utils

Class ResourcesLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • marc.nguyen.minesweeper.client.presentation.utils.ResourcesLoader
  • public class ResourcesLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Load the resources in RAM.

    Since these tiles will be used non-stop, we will store them here during the game runtime.

    Do not use the Singleton Pattern to avoid any performance issue during the entire runtime.
